properties.Name: Cinnabar Island
properties.Description: A town used to be here until it was swept away by an eruption.

properties.Name: Pallet Town
properties.Description: A fairly new and quiet town. It's a small and pretty place.

properties.Name: Viridian City
properties.Description: A beautiful city that is enveloped in green year-round.

properties.Name: Pewter City
properties.Description: A quiet city nestled between rugged mountains and rocks.

properties.Name: Cerulean City
properties.Description: A beautiful city with flowing water and blooming flowers.

properties.Name: Lavender Town
properties.Description: A small town covered in a beautiful hue of purple.

properties.Name: Saffron City
properties.Description: The biggest city in Kanto, shining with a golden light.

properties.Name: Celadon City
properties.Description: A rich, rainbow colored city where people and Pokémon gather.

properties.Name: Fuschia City
properties.Description: A historic village that has become new.

properties.Name: Vermilion City
properties.Description: A southern city that is bathed in orange by the setting sun.
A town where the wind blows and tells of impending change.
properties.Name: New Bark Town
Cherrygrove City
properties.Description: A city where you can smell small flowers and a sea breeze.

properties.Name: Violet City
properties.Description: This old village is still surrounded by trees and other scenery. Sprout Tower is located here; it is a tower where they study diligently to learn to live with Pokémon.

properties.Name: Goldenrod City
properties.Description: A developing city where people and Pokémon come and go as they like.

properties.Name: Azalea Town
properties.Description: A town where people and Pokémon live together in simple harmony. Slowpoke Well is located here; when Slowpoke are thirsty, they come here to drink.

properties.Name: Ecruteak City
properties.Description: A city that even now bears the marks of its history. Located here are Bell Tower, a tower that's said to have a Legendary Pokémon that lands there, and Burned Tower, a tower that was hit by lightning, and subsequently caught fire and burned.

properties.Name: Olivine City
properties.Description: A city where you can hear the melody of the sea. Glitter Lighthouse is located here; it shines brightly over the ocean with the power of Ampharos.

properties.Name: Cianwood City
properties.Description: A beachside city that has benefitted greatly from the sea.

properties.Name: Blackthorn City
properties.Description: A mysterious mountain village cut into a rock face. Dragon's Den is located here.

properties.Name: Castelia City
properties.Description: A big city with skyscrapers piercing the clouds.

properties.Name: Nimbasa City
properties.Description: A bustling city of entertainment, with many theme parks.

properties.Name: Black City
properties.Description: A modern city of ongoing development that draws people to it.

properties.Name: Nacrene City
properties.Description: A city established in restored storehouses built 100 years ago.

properties.Name: Striaton City
properties.Description: Entry stairs built in memory of a former home in a snowier climate.

properties.Name: Accumula Town
properties.Description: This town offers great views due to its many hills.

properties.Name: Nuvema Town
properties.Description: A rural town whose sea breezes give the sense of something coming.

properties.Name: Undella Town
properties.Description: A summer retreat with a beach full of people who enjoy summer vacations.

properties.Name: Lacunosa Town
properties.Description: A town where all honor old customs, living as methodically as clockwork.

properties.Name: Pokemon League(Unova)
properties.Description: Only the Trainers who have conquered all Pokémon Gyms can challenge here.

properties.Name: Opelucid City
properties.Description: A convenient city of rapid change, showing no traces of the past.

properties.Name: Iccirus City
properties.Description: In winter, the city is covered with snow as far as the eye can see.

properties.Name: Mistralton City
properties.Description: Vegetables are grown by the runway and transported by cargo plane.

properties.Name: Driftveil City
properties.Description: A port town distributing many goods, and a gateway to the Unova region.

properties.Name: Rustboro City
properties.Description: This city is the main hub of industry in the Hoenn region, with the Devon Corporation as its beating heart.

properties.Name: Fallarbor Town
properties.Description: A town formed by scholars who gather to research meteorites.

properties.Name: Mauville City
properties.Description: This large city is located in the heart of the Hoenn region, at the crossroads of its nostalgic past and new technology.

properties.Name: Fortree City
properties.Description: The people and the Pokémon of this city follow nature's cues to rise each morning and end each day.

properties.Name: Lilycove City
properties.Description: This tourist destination is undergoing a revival, thanks to the popularity of its Pokémon Contest Spectaculars.

properties.Name: Sootopolis City
properties.Description: This city, which rises from the crater of a great meteoroid crash, can only be reached through the sea or from the sky.

properties.Name: Mosdeep City
properties.Description: Research is underway day and night in this city, all in the hope of understanding the distant reaches of space.

properties.Name: Ever Grande City
properties.Description: This city is blanketed in a profusion of colorful blooms. It plays host to the grand Pokémon League. A revered site that can only be visited by those Trainers who have dominated every last Pokémon Gym.

properties.Name: Pacifidlog Town
properties.Description: This town first came into being as a floating storehouse used by people living on the ocean's surface.

properties.Name: Slateport City
properties.Description: People from many different regions gather and mingle in this bustling port city.

properties.Name: Lavaridge Town
properties.Description: A popular spot in the Hoenn region, thanks to its hot springs, said to cure any ailment.

properties.Name: Verdanturf Town
properties.Description: Thanks to the prevailing wind pattern, this town is always kept clear of falling volcanic ash.

properties.Name: Littleroot Town
properties.Description: Basking amid vibrant nature, this simple town is not shaded with any one hue.

properties.Name: Petalburg City
properties.Description: A whiff of salt is always in the air in this city, which is skirted by the ocean shore.

properties.Name: Dewford Town
properties.Description: New trends are always the rage among the inhabitants of this small island town.

properties.Name: One Island
properties.Description: The port of the Sevii Islands.

properties.Name: Two Island
properties.Description: A trading post for many foreign goods.

properties.Name: Three Island
properties.Description: The largest settlement in the Sevii Islands

properties.Name: Five Island
properties.Description: The smallest town in the pokemon world

properties.Name: Four Island
properties.Description: An isolated town.

properties.Name: Canalave City
properties.Description: A port city that is bisected by a canal. It has a distinctly exotic air of foreign culture.

properties.Name: Jubilife City
properties.Description: The most modernized city in the Sinnoh region. It is bustling with people on the go.

properties.Name: Oreburgh City
properties.Description: A vibrant and energetic mining town that is blessed with a precious natural resource.

properties.Name: Floaroma Town
properties.Description: A town of flower lovers, Floaroma Town is always perfumed with the sweet scent of flowers.

properties.Name: Eterna City
properties.Description: An old city that shows fading and almost-forgotten vestiges of ancient history.

properties.Name: Hearthome City
properties.Description: This friendly city started as a place where people and Pokémon gathered, then grew into a center of commerce.

properties.Name: Solaceon Town
properties.Description: The temperate climate makes this town a relaxed and casual place for people and Pokémon to live in

properties.Name: Celestic Town
properties.Description: A tiny town that preserves the history of Sinnoh and the old ways of life. In the center of the town is a small shrine that dates to ancient times.

properties.Name: Snowpoint City
properties.Description: A winter wonderland of a city where stout trees and buildings are blanketed in thick snow. The Gym is at the heart of the city. To the north is the Snowpoint Temple.

properties.Name: Fight Area
properties.Description: A tiny port city where Trainers who love battling more than eating gather. The gateway to the Battle Frontier is located here. Moored at the pier is the ferry to Snowpoint City.

properties.Name: Resort Area
properties.Description: A town that attracts Trainers who know there are other ways of enjoying Pokémon than battling.

properties.Name: Survival Area
properties.Description: A town where hot-blooded Trainers gather to work out and hone their battling skills.

properties.Name: Veilstone City
properties.Description: This city was made by carving out steep, rocky mountains. Its isolation limits its contact with other cities. The city puts effort into providing entertainment.

properties.Name: Sunyshore City
properties.Description: A port city that was built around the bay portion of the cape. It is criss-crossed by elevated walkways. The Gym is located atop a rocky outcropping. Down the beach is a festive bazaar. The Vista Lighthouse's bright beacon illuminates the Sinnoh region.

properties.Name: Pokemon League
properties.Description: Trainers seeking to be the best arrive here after a long and grueling journey.

properties.Name: Pastoria City
properties.Description: This city was originally founded to protect the Great Marsh. It has grown naturally over the years.

properties.Name: Sandgem Town
properties.Description: A sandy town that is located right next to a beach. It is redolent with the salty scent of the sea.

properties.Name: Twinleaf Town
properties.Description: A small town with the fresh scent of new leaves in the air. It feels like a place where adventures start.

properties.Name: Gateon Port
properties.Description: Seaside city with a famous lighthouse

properties.Name: Pyrite Town
properties.Description: A rough and dirty town full of thugs and scoundrels.

properties.Name: Seven Island
properties.Description: The population of Seven Island has adapted to the rocky terrain of the island.

properties.Name: Six Island
properties.Description: the view of the stars in Six Island is amazing, away from the bright city lights.

properties.Name: Mahogany Town
properties.Description: A town with a suspicious air to it. It's a hiding place for ninjas.
